parameters.jsonBody:
{
  "prompt": "anthropomorphic fox wearing green hoodie, sitting at desk, cartoon illustration, painterly style, warm colors, expressive face, disney style, storybook art, soft light, detailed background, cozy atmosphere",
  "negative_prompt": "photo, realistic, 3d render, ugly, distorted, glitch, blurry",
  "params": {
    "sampler_name": "k_euler_a",
    "cfg_scale": 7,
    "steps": 35,
    "width": 1152,
    "height": 768,
    "n": 1,
    "clip_skip": 2,
    "hires_fix": true
  },
  "models": ["SDXL 1.0"],
  "r2": true
}
